title: Silence
lyrics:
Sum-eul goleuneun nae ibga-e
Gyaushaneun gogae (gyaushaneun gogae)
Baby, no matter what they say
Eunmilhi deuleonae (ok, ok)
Illeong-ineun heulin angaes-sog hyang-i gadeughan chae
Aseulhan deus binteum-eobs-i pyochulhae yeah



Bultumyeonghan ibsul (keep an eye on it babe)

Seonmyeonghan nae chojeom (keep an eye on it babe)

Solil nael saeng-gag-i eobsneun neoui ma-eum

(naega sseuleojyeo beolil mal-ilado)



Baby I don’t know

Heongkeul-eojyeo beolin meoli neomeoe yeah

Nae ilbulado jonjaehandamyeon ne mam-eul nan bwayagess-eo



Bulg-ge muldeun gaseumsog nae mam-eul

Da jwin chae meomchuji ma

(chagaun) jeongjeog sog-e gadhin nan

I goyoham jubyeon-e maemdolmyeonseo neoleul gidalyeo



Why don't you talk about us

Oh you don't talk about us

Nae gaseum-eul joyeooneun gin chimmug silence ye

Why don't you talk about us

I told you everything baby

Sum-i maghyeooneun silence



Neon gamanhi naleul balabomyeo

Dalli daleun mal-eun haji anh-a never never

Neon gamanhi naleul balabomyeo

Dalli daleun gos-eul bojido anh-a never neverya

Naebaet-eojineun anhneun sum

Dol-agagin aemaehae eong-geojuchum

I’m a Medusa gwisga-en jeongjeogman-i nam-a

Nal goelobhijanh-a neoui silence



Keuge daleum-eobsneun gwisga-e ban-eunghaneun nunmae

Baby, no matter what they say

Ne ibsulman nun-e



Midong eobsneun pyojeong (keep an eye on it babe)

Gaeji anhneun jeogmag (keep an eye on it babe)

Miyaghamdo eobsneun danpyeonjeog-in ma-eum

(naega muneojyeobeolil mal-ilado)



Baby I don’t know

Kkamppag-imdo eobsneun du nun neomeoe yeah

Nae ilbulado jonjaehandamyeon ne mam-eul nan bwayagess-eo



Bulg-ge muldeun gaseumsog nae mam-eul

Da jwin chae meomchuji ma

(chagaun) jeongjeog sog-e gadhin nan

I goyoham jubyeon-e maemdolmyeonseo neoleul gidalyeo



Why don't you talk about us

Oh you don't talk about us

Nae gaseum-eul joyeooneun gin chimmug silence ye

Why don't you talk about us

I told you everything baby

Sum-i maghyeooneun silence



Maghim-eobs-i ne sog-e neol deuleonaejwo babe

Uimi eobsneun sigan sog nogoljeog-in nawa myosadoel su eobsneun your silence yeah



I eosaegham-eul beosgyeonaeya dwae nega

Yeong-wonhi gidalil su eobs-eo nan nega

Ne an-e jali jab-eun neoleul kkeonael geola mid-eo

Neodo mwonga issneun geos gat-a

Naega iss-eul geos gat-a nan

Salmyeosi ollagaldeushan ib

Kkeut-eobsneun muge neomeo wanjeonhan neol boyeojwo



Eodum sog-e jamgin nal gamanhi boji ma

Jeongjeog sog-e gadhin chae

I goyoham jubyeon-e maemdolmyeonseo neoleul gidalyeo



I I will break the silence

I I will break the silence

Why don't you talk about us

I told you everything baby

Nawaui chimmug-eseo beos-eonawa jwo silence
